job_title: Sr. Java Developer with Strong Spark Experience

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)

jd: Hello Partner’s, I have very urgent position on Sr. Java Developer with Strong Spark experience Job Title: Sr. Java Developer with Strong Spark Experience Location: Phoenix, AZ (On-Site)Duration: 12 Month Contract Start Date: ASAP Job Description:- Key Responsibilities:Develop, test, and maintain big data processing applications using Java and Apache Spark.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and optimize data pipelines.Write efficient and scalable Spark code for batch and real-time data processing.Integrate with data storage solutions such as HDFS, Hive, or relational databases.Ensure code quality through unit testing, integration testing, and peer reviews.Troubleshoot and debug production issues, ensuring system stability and performance.Participate in system design and architectural decisions.Document technical design and development processes.Required Skills and Qualifications:8+ years of experience in Java development.3+ years of hands-on experience with Apache Spark (including Spark Core, Spark SQL, and Spark Streaming).Proficiency with Big Data technologies such as HDFS, Hive, or Kafka.Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and distributed computing principles.Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, Cassandra).Familiarity with building and consuming REST APIs.Experience with CI/CD pipelines and version control (e.g., Git).Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and big data services is a plus.Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work in a fast-paced environment. Education:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
